title: Account login issue
description: The customer is unable to log in to their account. They have tried resetting the password but the link is not working.

title: Question about billing
description: Customer needs to clarify a recent charge on their credit card. They believe there's a double charge.

title: Feature request: dark mode
description: The customer would like to request a dark mode feature for the application interface.

title: Mobile app crashing on Android
description: The mobile app crashes every time the customer tries to open the settings page on their Android device.

title: Can't access saved files
description: Customer reports that their saved files are not appearing in their account. They suspect a synchronization issue.

title: Typo on pricing page
description: Found a small typo in the description of the 'Pro' plan on the pricing page.

title: Account verification failed
description: Customer is trying to verify their account but is getting an 'Invalid Code' error, even after requesting a new code multiple times.

title: Unable to change profile picture
description: The 'Change Profile Picture' button is unresponsive on the user's profile page.

title: Question about API documentation
description: Customer needs clarification on the authentication process described in the API documentation.

title: Application performance is slow
description: User reports that the application has been running very slowly for the past few hours, especially when loading dashboards.
